parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the domain where the data product revision is created.

parameters.name: formsInput
parameters.description: The metadata forms of the data product revision. (dict) --- The details of a metadata form. content (string) --- The content of the metadata form. The name of the metadata form. typeIdentifier (string) --- The ID of the metadata form type. typeRevision (string) --- The revision of the metadata form type.

nested_params.description: The ID of the metadata form type.

nested_params.name: typeRevision
nested_params.description: The revision of the metadata form type.

parameters.name: identifier
